text: Hi Bianca, happy new year! I heard about some “VFX Saturday schools” today so thought I would pass on the details...

Great news, Escape Studios are running Saturday Clubs starting 11 January! Kids (13-16 year olds) get 15 free Saturday morning lessons learning to sculpt and animate their own superheros using Maya and zBrush taught by expert tutors, concluding with an exhibition to the public at Somerset House. Best of all... it's FREE!

Click on the link below for more information and to register!
<https://www.pearsoncollegelondon.ac.uk/campaigns/saturday-club.html|https://www.pearsoncollegelondon.ac.uk/campaigns/saturday-club.html>

attachments.title: Art and Design Saturday Club | Escape Studios London
attachments.text: Our Saturday Club is free and is led by expert tutors who will give attendees (students between the ages of 13-16) a chance to learn the skills used in VFX, Games and Animation
attachments.fallback: Art and Design Saturday Club | Escape Studios London

text: It’s more on the artistic than the programming side so o don’t know if you’d be interested, but perhaps you know someone who might be!
Also, do you want to schedule in a chat at some point soon? Maybe 15 mins or so. I thought it might be nice to have a proper conversation when we’re both free to answer straight away :)
